task_description: Step on both pressure plates at the same time to open the trapdoor and escape.
Step on the stone pressure plate to remove the birch door blocks and escape.
Step on the stone pressure plate to power the redstone lamp and open the trapdoor for escape.
Step on the birch pressure plate to open the trapdoor and clear the stone blocks for escape.
Step on the stone pressure plate to open the iron trapdoor, then press the stone button to remove the wall blocks and escape.
Step on the stone pressure plate and press the birch button to open the trapdoor and clear the path for escape.
Step on the stone pressure plate to open the iron trapdoor and press the birch button to remove the wall blocks for escape.
Step on the pressure plate to open the trapdoor and escape.
Press the stone pressure plate and the stone button at the same time to open the trapdoor and clear the path for escape.
Step on the stone pressure plate to open the iron trapdoor and reveal the escape path.
Both agents must stand on their respective pressure plates at the same time to open the trapdoor above.
Step on the stone pressure plate to open the birch doors and escape.
Step on the stone pressure plate to open the trapdoor and reveal the escape path. Collect the emerald as a reward.
Step on the pressure plate to open the trapdoor and deactivate the redstone torch, allowing the piston to extend and clear the path for escape.
Step on the stone pressure plate and press the stone button to open the trapdoors and escape.
Place a stone on the birch pressure plate to open the iron trapdoors and escape. You will receive an emerald as a reward.
Step on the stone pressure plate and press the stone button to open the birch doors and clear the path.
Step on the stone pressure plate to open the trapdoor and press the stone button to clear the escape path.
Place a stone on the pressure plate and press the button to open the trapdoors and escape. An emerald awaits the successful escaper.
Open the trapdoor to access the button. Pressing the button will open the escape route.
Step on the pressure plate to open the trapdoor and escape the room. Beware of the zombie!
Step on both pressure plates to open the trapdoors and escape through the wall.
Step on the stone pressure plate to open the trapdoor and escape. Check the chest for a reward.
Step on the stone pressure plate to remove the bedrock wall and escape.
Step on the pressure plate to open the trapdoor and escape through the ceiling.
Step on the pressure plate to open the trapdoor and escape through the opening.
Step on the stone pressure plate and press the oak button to open the birch door and escape.
Step on the stone pressure plate to power the redstone lamp and open the birch door for escape.
Step on the pressure plate to light the lamp, then press the button to open the trapdoor and escape.
Place a redstone block next to the stone pressure plate and step on it to open the birch door and escape.
Step on the pressure plate to open the trapdoor above, allowing escape through the ceiling.
Step on the stone pressure plate to open the iron trapdoor and create an escape path through the wall at position 0 0 4.
Step on the oak pressure plate to power it, then step on the stone pressure plate to light up the redstone lamp and open the birch door for escape.
Step on the stone pressure plate to open the trapdoor above and escape through the ceiling.
Step on the birch pressure plate to open the iron trapdoor and escape.
Step on the pressure plate to open the trapdoor and escape through the opening.
